recommended_degree: Ekonomi, Keuangan dan Perbankan, Manajemen Keuangan, Akuntansi Manajemen, Akuntansi Manajerial, Manajemen (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: The Finance & Administration Intern will support the team with administrative and asset management activities. Key responsibilities include tagging fixed assets, organizing and filing documents related to SA, Tax, and Accounts Payable, as well as assisting in monitoring raw material prices and in-transit materials. This role provides exposure to financial administration and operational support processes.
